verses.verse: יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מָ֭לָךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigneth יִרְגְּז֣וּ <S%H7264><s%> tremble עַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> let the people יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> he sitteth כְּ֝רוּבִ֗ים <S%H3742><s%> [between] the cherubims תָּנ֥וּט <S%H5120><s%> be moved הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> let the earth

יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בְּצִיּ֣וֹן <S%H6726><s%> in Zion גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is] great וְרָ֥ם <S%H7311><s%> and he [is] high ה֝֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽעַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> above all the people

יוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> Let them praise שִׁ֭מְךָ <S%H8034><s%> name גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> thy great וְנוֹרָ֗א <S%H3372><s%> and terrible קָד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> [for] it [is] holy הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְעֹ֥ז <S%H5797><s%> strength מֶלֶךְ֮ <S%H4428><s%> The king's מִשְׁפָּ֪ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment אָ֫הֵ֥ב <S%H157><s%> also loveth אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> You כּוֹנַ֣נְתָּ <S%H3559><s%> thou dost establish מֵישָׁרִ֑ים <S%H4339><s%> equity מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה <S%H6666><s%> and righteousness בְּיַעֲקֹ֤ב ׀ <S%H3290><s%> in Jacob אַתָּ֬ה <S%H859><s%> You עָשִֽׂיתָ׃ <S%H6213><s%> thou executest

רֽוֹמְמ֡וּ <S%H7311><s%> Exalt יְה֘וָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> ye the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God וְֽ֭הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ <S%H7812><s%> and worship לַהֲדֹ֥ם <S%H1916><s%> stool רַגְלָ֗יו <S%H7272><s%> be able to endure קָד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> [for] he [is] holy הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

מֹ֘שֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֨ן ׀ <S%H175><s%> and Aaron בְּֽכֹהֲנָ֗יו <S%H3548><s%> among his priests וּ֭שְׁמוּאֵל <S%H8050><s%> and Samuel בְּקֹרְאֵ֣י <S%H7121><s%> among them that call שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> upon his name קֹרִ֥אים <S%H7121><s%> they called אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> upon יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> upon the LORD וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> and He יַעֲנֵֽם׃ <S%H6030><s%> and he answered

בְּעַמּ֣וּד <S%H5982><s%> pillar עָ֭נָן <S%H6051><s%> unto them in the cloudy יְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> He spake אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about שָׁמְר֥וּ <S%H8104><s%> they kept עֵ֝דֹתָ֗יו <S%H5713><s%> his testimonies וְחֹ֣ק <S%H2706><s%> and the ordinance נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> [that] he gave לָֽמוֹ׃

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵינוּ֮ <S%H430><s%> our God אַתָּ֪ה <S%H859><s%> You עֲנִ֫יתָ֥ם <S%H6030><s%> Thou answeredst אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> thou wast a God נֹ֭שֵׂא <S%H5375><s%> that forgavest הָיִ֣יתָ <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> to them וְ֝נֹקֵ֗ם <S%H5358><s%> them though thou tookest vengeance עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of עֲלִילוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H5949><s%> of their inventions

רֽוֹמְמ֡וּ <S%H7311><s%> Exalt יְה֘וָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God וְ֭הִֽשְׁתַּחֲווּ <S%H7812><s%> and worship לְהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> hill קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> at his holy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For קָ֝ד֗וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> [is] holy יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> our God
